      Return short or full plot.

      Return the long plot
      OmdbBuilder OmdbBuilder.setPlotLong()
      Deprecated. 
      OmdbBuilder OmdbBuilder.setPlotShort()
      Return the short plot
      OmdbBuilder OmdbBuilder.setResultType(ResultType resultType)
      The type of video to return: Movie, Series or Episode.
      OmdbBuilder OmdbBuilder.setSearchTerm(String searchTerm)
      Set the search term
      OmdbBuilder OmdbBuilder.setTitle(String title)
      The title to search for
      OmdbBuilder OmdbBuilder.setTomatoes(boolean tomatoes)
      Include or exclude Rotten Tomatoes ratings.
      OmdbBuilder OmdbBuilder.setTomatoesOff()
      Exclude Rotten Tomatoes ratings.
      OmdbBuilder OmdbBuilder.setTomatoesOn()
      Include Rotten Tomatoes ratings.
      OmdbBuilder OmdbBuilder.setTypeEpisode()
      Limit the results to episodes
      OmdbBuilder OmdbBuilder.setTypeMovie()
      Limit the results to movies
      OmdbBuilder OmdbBuilder.setTypeSeries()
      Limit the results to series
